Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Prohibits the rent guidelines board from increasing rents on certain leases during a state disaster emergency
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the rent guidelines board from increasing rents on one year leases during a state disaster emergency.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-510, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the rent guidelines board from increasing rents on certain leases during a state disaster emergency
